questions.question_text:
A subscription product that was newly created fails to display in the Product Selection screen when users search for it.
What are three possible reasons for this behavior? (Choose three.)

choices.E: The Component checkbox is TRUE on the Product record.
choices.C: The Product is missing a Pricebook Entry for the Quote's Pricebook.
choices.B: The Optional checkbox is TRUE on the Product record.
choices.D: The Active checkbox is FALSE on the Product record.
choices.A: The Product is missing a related Cost record.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
"The QuoteLine Delete permission is required to delete quote lines in the quote line editor."

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.cpq_permission_guidelines.htm&type=5

questions.question_text:
The admin at Universal Containers is setting up permissions for internal sales users.
In addition to assigning the Salesforce CPQ User permission set, for which objects do the users need Read, Create, Edit, Delete permissions?

choices.B: Quote, Quote Line, Quote Line Group, Quote Document
choices.A: Discount Category, Discount Schedule, Discount Tier, Term Schedule
choices.D: Quote Template, Template Content, Template Section, Line Column
choices.C: Price Rule, Price Action, Price Condition, Lookup Query
Set the Renewal Pricing Method on the Contract to Uplift.
choices.B: Fill in the appropriate Renewal Uplift Rate on each Quote Line record.
choices.D: Set the Renewal Pricing Method on the Account to Uplift.
choices.A: Fill in the appropriate Renewal Uplift Rate on each Subscription record.

Which two actions should the admin take to ensure CPQ applies the correct price uplift? (Choose two.)

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers (UC) has products that will only be utilized as Product Options inside five different bundle products. When a user adds products to the Quote Line Editor, UC wants:
Bundle products to show in the Product Selection page.
Products that are Product Options of the bundles to be excluded from the Product Selection page.
How should the Admin set up the bundles?

choices.A: Select the Component checkbox on any Product that is a Product Option for the bundles.
choices.B: Select the bundled checkbox on each Product Option and mark the Product inactive.
choices.C: Select the Selected checkbox on each Product Option and mark the Product inactive.
choices.D: Select the Hidden checkbox for any Product that is a Product Option for the bundles.

questions.question_text:
An admin has implemented a new CPQ business requirement in a sandbox. They have created new products and used them to construct a bundle. The admin has also created a Product Rule that automatically selects Product Options when the user selects a specific Configuration
Attribute.
In which sequence should the admin migrate the records related to the new CPQ functionality in order to maintain record relationships?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
To create a configuration attribute, you must include the product option's field in the Target Field of the Configuration Attribute object.

Selected Answer: B
https://sf9to5.com/2017/09/28/cpq-data-migration/
1.Products
2.Product Features
3.Product Options
4.Configuration Attributes

choices.A: Products, Configuration Attributes, Product Rules, Configuration Rules, Product Options
choices.C: Products, Configuration Attributes, Product Options, Product Rules, Configuration Rules
choices.B: Products, Product Options, Configuration Attributes, Product Rules, Configuration Rules
choices.D: Configuration Attributes, Products, Product Options, Product Rules, Configuration Rules
